metadata.title: CVE-2023-35827 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 6.3.8. A use-after-freewas found in ravb_remove in drivers/net/ethernet/renesas/ravb_main.c.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
